content: **crochet drops hat in cotton viscose and bomull-lin size s/m m/l ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** s/m m/l head circumference 52/54 56/58 cm / 20 /21 22 /23 **materials** drops bomull-lin from garnstudio 100 -100 g colour no 03 off-white mix and use drops cotton viscose from garnstudio 100-100 g colour no 17 beige drops crochet hook size 4 mm us g/6 - or size needed to obtain 13 treble_crochet us x 6 5 row with 1 thread of each quality = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4
